docs.text: About David Finster I'm a coffee geek, expert sailor, and not a great guitar player. I'm also the Technical Editor and Developer Advocate at vultr.com . If you'd like to participate in Vultr's Trusted Author Program or have a question about Vultr's infrastructure, contact me or look me up on Twitter , Reddit , LinkedIn , Stack Overflow , Twitch , and GitHub .
